sqlMap.statement: SELECT HS04.EAISVCNAME AS "EAISVCNAME" ,HS05.BZWKSVCKEYNAME AS "BZWKSVCKEYNAME" ,HS05.COLUMNNAME AS "COLUMNNAME" ,HS05.COLUMNVALUE AS "COLUMNVALUE" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHS04 HS04, $schemaId$.TSEAIHS05 HS05 WHERE HS04.BZWKSVCKEYNAME = #bzwkSvcKeyName# AND HS04.BZWKSVCKEYNAME = HS05.BZWKSVCKEYNAME
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIHS05 ( BZWKSVCKEYNAME , COLUMNNAME , COLUMNVALUE ) VALUES ( #bzwkSvcKeyName#, #columnName#, #columnValue# )
sqlMap.statement: SELECT COLUMNNAME AS "COLUMNNAME" , COLUMNDESC AS "COLUMNDESC" , COLUMNLENGTH AS "COLUMNLENGTH" , ISKEY AS "ISKEY" , KEYSEQ AS "KEYSEQ" , ISINTERFACE AS "ISINTERFACE" , COMBONAME AS "COMBONAME" , COMBODEPTH AS "COMBODEPTH" , COLUMNDEFAULT AS "COLUMNDEFAULT" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHS03 WHERE ISKEY = 'Y' ORDER BY KEYSEQ

SELECT COLUMNNAME AS "COLUMNNAME" , COLUMNDESC AS "COLUMNDESC" , COLUMNLENGTH AS "COLUMNLENGTH" , ISKEY AS "ISKEY" , KEYSEQ AS "KEYSEQ" , ISINTERFACE AS "ISINTERFACE" , COMBONAME AS "COMBONAME" , COMBODEPTH AS "COMBODEPTH" , COLUMNDEFAULT AS "COLUMNDEFAULT" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHS03
SELECT BZWKSVCKEYNAME AS "BZWKSVCKEYNAME" , EAISVCNAME AS "EAISVCNAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHS04 WHERE BZWKSVCKEYNAME=#bzwkSvcKeyName#
SELECT PRPTYNAME AS "CODE", PRPTY2VAL AS "NAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM03 WHERE PRPTYGROUPNAME = #prptyGroupName# ORDER BY PRPTYNAME
